ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide

Class Treatment

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.soton.gdp.lifeguide.Treatment

  • public class Treatment
extends java.lang.Object
    An object which represents a treatment arm within a TrialDefinition.
    Since:
    1.7
    Author:
    Liam de Valmency (lpdv1g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Aleksandar Botev (ab9g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Dionisio Perez-Mavrogenis (dpm3g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Kim Svensson (ks6g10@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Treatment

        public Treatment(java.lang.String id,
         int weight)
        Constructs a Treatment with the given name (ID) and weight.
        Parameters:
        id - The treatment's ID.
        weight - The weight of this treatment, used to increase/decrease the ratio of allocations for this treatment arm.

      • Treatment

        public Treatment(java.lang.String id,
         int weight,
         int maxParticipants)
        Constructs a Treatment with the given name (ID) and weight.
        Parameters:
        id - The treatment's ID.
        weight - The weight of this treatment, used to increase/decrease the ratio of allocations for this treatment arm.
        maxParticipants - The maximum number of participants which can be allocated to this treatment arm. Optional, see Treatment(String, int).
